actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Agriculture to call a hearing in a milk market order area upon petition of producers.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Agriculture to call a hearing in a milk market order area upon petition of one-third or more of the producers.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Agriculture to call a hearing in a milk market order area upon petition of producers.
